1_executive_summary.feature_description: Separate the schemes system from the coaching staff system to establish a clear separation of concerns. Create a standalone schemes module that defines all offensive, defensive, and special teams schemes with their bonuses, penalties, play calling tendencies, and player fit calculations. Refactor the coaching module to reference schemes instead of defining them inline.
1_executive_summary.primary_goal: Create a modular, reusable schemes system that can be consumed by coaching, player generation, roster management, and simulation systems independently.

in_scope: Create new src/lib/schemes/ module with complete type definitions
Define all 6 offensive schemes with full data (West Coast, Spread, Pro Style, Air Raid, Power Run, Zone Run)
Define all 6 defensive schemes with full data (4-3, 3-4, Cover 2, Cover 3, Man Blitz, Zone Blitz)
Define all 3 ST philosophies (Aggressive Returns, Conservative, Coverage Specialist)
Implement player scheme fit calculation system (5 levels: Perfect to Terrible)
Refactor coaching types to reference schemes module
Update Coach interface for dual schemes (HC) and role-specific schemes
Add Players Coach perk to HC perks
Update coaching generator for new scheme structure

risks.mitigation: Export scheme types from schemes module with same names, update coaching types to import from new location
Update Coach interface to have separate offensiveScheme and defensiveScheme optional properties

risks.description: UI not reflecting new scheme structure
risks.mitigation: Update coaching page to show both offensive and defensive schemes for HC

complexity_factors: Type system changes require careful migration

files_to_create.purpose: Scheme type definitions, interfaces, and constants
Complete scheme definitions with all bonuses, tendencies, personnel requirements

files_to_modify.changes: Remove scheme definitions, import from schemes module, update Coach interface, add Players Coach perk, rename ST to STC
Update scheme assignment for HC dual schemes, import schemes from new module
No changes expected, but verify compatibility
No changes expected, verify types work
Update Schemes tab to show offensive and defensive separately, show HC with both schemes

features.name: Schemes Module Types
features.description: Create type definitions for all schemes including OffensiveScheme, DefensiveScheme, STPhilosophy, SchemeFit levels, and supporting interfaces

features.name: Offensive Scheme Data
features.description: Complete definitions for all 6 offensive schemes: West Coast, Spread, Pro Style, Air Raid, Power Run, Zone Run - including philosophy, bonuses, penalties, play calling tendencies, and ideal personnel

features.name: Defensive Scheme Data
features.description: Complete definitions for all 6 defensive schemes: 4-3, 3-4, Cover 2, Cover 3, Man Blitz, Zone Blitz - including formation, bonuses, penalties, and personnel packages

features.name: ST Philosophy Data
features.description: Complete definitions for 3 special teams philosophies: Aggressive Returns, Conservative, Coverage Specialist

features.name: Player Scheme Fit System
features.description: Functions to calculate player scheme fit based on archetype and attributes, returning fit level with OVR modifier

features.name: Coaching Types Refactor
features.description: Update coaching types to import schemes, update Coach interface for dual schemes (HC), rename ST to STC, add Players Coach perk

features.name: Coaching Generator Update
features.description: Update generator to assign schemes correctly: HC gets both offensive and defensive, OC gets offensive, DC gets defensive, STC gets philosophy

features.name: Dev Tools UI Update
features.description: Update coaching dev tools page to display schemes correctly with new structure

tasks.description: Create src/lib/schemes/ directory structure
Create schemes/types.ts with OffensiveScheme, DefensiveScheme, STPhilosophy types
Add SchemeFit type and SCHEME_FIT_MODIFIERS constant
Add SchemeDefinition, AttributeModifier, PlayTendencies, PositionRequirement interfaces
Create schemes/scheme-data.ts with West Coast scheme definition
Add Spread scheme definition
Add Pro Style scheme definition
Add Air Raid scheme definition
Add Power Run scheme definition
Add Zone Run scheme definition
Add 4-3 Base defensive scheme definition
Add 3-4 Base defensive scheme definition
Add Cover 2 defensive scheme definition
Add Cover 3 defensive scheme definition
Add Man Blitz defensive scheme definition
Add Zone Blitz defensive scheme definition
Add 3 ST philosophies (Aggressive Returns, Conservative, Coverage Specialist)
Add scheme matchup data (strong against, weak against)
Create schemes/scheme-fit.ts with archetype affinity mappings
Add calculateSchemeFit function for attribute-based fit calculation
Add scheme adjustment period logic (4 weeks transition)
Add scheme families constant for faster adjustments
Remove scheme definitions from coaching/types.ts
Add imports from schemes module to coaching/types.ts
Update Coach interface: add offensiveScheme?, defensiveScheme?, stPhilosophy?
Rename CoachPosition ST to STC
Add Players Coach perk to HC_PERKS
Update CoachingStats schemeDistribution for new structure
Update coaching-generator.ts imports from schemes module
Update generateCoach to assign HC both offensive and defensive schemes
Update getSchemeForPosition to return correct scheme types by role
Update getCoachingStats to track schemes correctly
Update ST position references to STC throughout generator
Update coaching page imports for new scheme types
Update Schemes tab to show offensive and defensive schemes separately
Update By Team tab to display HC with both schemes
Update coach position labels from ST to STC
Run TypeScript compiler to verify no type errors
Test coaching generator produces valid data
Test dev tools UI displays correctly

phases.name: Create Schemes Module
phases.description: Build the new schemes module with complete type definitions and scheme data
deliverables: src/lib/schemes/scheme-data.ts with 6 offensive, 6 defensive, 3 ST schemes

phases.name: Player Fit System & Coaching Refactor
phases.description: Implement scheme fit calculations and refactor coaching types
deliverables: Updated src/lib/coaching/types.ts importing from schemes module

phases.name: Generator & UI Updates
phases.description: Update coaching generator and dev tools UI for new structure

phases.name: Testing & Verification
phases.description: Verify all changes work correctly together

7_testing_strategy.approach: Manual testing via dev tools and TypeScript compilation

tests.description: Run npx tsc to verify no TypeScript errors
Generate coaching data via API and verify structure
steps: Navigate to dev tools coaching page
Verify HC has both offensive and defensive schemes
Verify OC has only offensive scheme
Verify DC has only defensive scheme
Verify STC has only ST philosophy
Check Schemes tab shows offensive and defensive separately
Check By Team shows HC with both schemes
Check position labels show STC not ST

criteria.description: Schemes module exists at src/lib/schemes/ with types.ts, scheme-data.ts, scheme-fit.ts
All 6 offensive schemes defined with bonuses, penalties, and play tendencies
All 6 defensive schemes defined with formations and personnel packages
Player scheme fit calculation returns 5 fit levels with correct OVR modifiers
Coaching types.ts imports schemes instead of defining them
HC has both offensiveScheme and defensiveScheme properties
Coach position ST renamed to STC throughout
Players Coach perk added to HC perks
TypeScript compilation passes with no errors
Dev tools coaching page displays schemes correctly
